## Public Member Functions

### getSplatValue() {#aa2ea20974430e8820f962083ca421c05}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Constant &#42; ConstantVector::getSplatValue (bool AllowPoison=false) const</>}>
If all elements of the vector constant have the same value, return that value.

Otherwise, return nullptr. Ignore poison elements by setting AllowPoison to true.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/constants-h/#l00541">541</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/constants-h">Constants.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/constants-cpp/#l01744">1744</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/constants-cpp">Constants.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getType() {#a905aa2c18ca16ed8304461695f373120}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>FixedVectorType &#42; llvm::ConstantVector::getType () const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Specialize the <a href="#a905aa2c18ca16ed8304461695f373120">getType()</a> method to always return a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedvectortype">FixedVectorType</a>, which reduces the amount of casting needed in parts of the compiler.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/constants-h/#l00534">534</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/constants-h">Constants.h</a>.

### getSplat() {#aa3b241b35b0039b413faf1ef4e873eb7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Constant &#42; ConstantVector::getSplat (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/elementcount">ElementCount</a> EC, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> &#42; Elt)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Return a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantvector">ConstantVector</a> with the specified constant in each element.

Note that this might not return an instance of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantvector">ConstantVector</a>
